actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to review and determine the impact of Indian tribal taxation on Indian reservations and residents, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior's review and approval of any tax ordinance proposed by an Indian tribe which would be imposed upon nontribal persons on an Indian reservation. Prohibits the Secretary from approving any such ordinance for two years after enactment of this Act. Directs the President to appoint a commission to review the economic impact of tribal taxes upon Indian reservations and to report to the Congress within one year after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to review and determine the impact of Indian tribal taxation on Indian reservations and residents, and for other purposes.
